about_the_game:
Aim in Space is a space simulator for training eSports skills. Here you will be able to develop the speed of your reaction, the ability to aim accurately, and also to think quickly.

Immerse yourself in the exciting atmosphere of the game




Here you will travel through space locations that must be protected from alien attacks. At each subsequent space base, there will be more and more new enemies. Don't give up and stay in line! Try to complete all 24 levels to repel all enemy attacks and save the earthlings.

Train your thinking speed




Unlike similar games, here you need to not only click on the target with the same mouse button. Everything is much more interesting! Different forms of attack must be used to destroy the various spaceships of the aliens. Galactic Intelligence will send you information from the secret archives on what combination of strikes will take down each of the possible enemies. Remember these combinations and use them correctly for each type of alien!

Key features of the game




  • 3 planets
  • 24 levels
  • various enemies
  • a challenge to your reaction and aiming

We are waiting for you, commander! Help us save all military bases!

  • OS *: Windows 7 or better

short_description: Help defend Earth's space base from invading enemy aliens in this incredible game to train reaction and aiming skills. Use your entire arsenal of weapons to destroy enemies of various types. Stand up to protect the planet. Best of luck!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Ukrainian, Turkish, Finnish, Swedish
